{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/fluid-width-macro": { "created": "20140907193724930", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "\define if-fluid(text) <$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="fluid-width" default="yes">$text$ \end", "modified": "20191230115804016", "modifier": "TonGerner", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/fluid-width-macro" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/icon": { "created": "20160109193157153", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/icon", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230115822324" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/license": { "created": "20180124193700068", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "[[Tristate plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023 MIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/license", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221228110059163" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/readme": { "created": "20140907194057629", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "This plugin is meant for widescreen monitors.
It changes the standard 'twostate' (<> / <>) functionality of the Sidebar to a 'tristate' (<> / <> / <>) functionality: # normal tiddler width (default 686px) with a broad Sidebar (showing <>). # small Sidebar (with programmable width; default 30em) and fluid tiddler width (showing <>). # fluid tiddler width without Sidebar (showing <>). <<< ''Note:'' * ''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html).'' * Sidebar layout (''~ControlPanel > Appearance > Theme Tweaks: Options'') @@color:red;''must''@@ be set at 'Fixed story, fluid sidebar'
('Fluid story, fixed sidebar' interferes with the Tristate plugin!) * The Sidebar width (default 30em) can be configured in [[Tristate width|$:/plugins/tg/tristate/settings]] (can also be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]], tab 'Tristate'''). <<< ", "modified": "20221228110855009", "modifier": "TonGerner", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/readme" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/settings": { "created": "20140907193931322", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "!!Tristate settings <>
", "caption": "Tristate", "modified": "20191230120210461", "modifier": "TonGerner", "tags": "$:/tags/plugin-tweaks", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/settings", "order": "10" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/stylesheet": { "created": "20140907193809552", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "

<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no">
